entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow near the British Columbia border. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
